Start:
 • Go through deck, only put down number cards and jokers and Aces
 • Leave center empty
 • Collect royals that come up during pulling cards to create grid for immediate placement

Placing royals
 • place royal next to card most like it (suit, color, and then value)(we need to develop rules to determine immediate card placement
 o suits first, then color, and then value, if all cards of same suit are covered, go by point value 

Playing the Game:

• after initial royal cards are placed, pull top card from deck 
 • card can only be placed on stack with less or equal value than it
 • if royal is picked up, place it on edge following the royal rules 
 • if you have a card you can’t place, you have 2 options: o you put it in the ‘shame pile’ and you have to ‘reset’ a pile, by putting all of the cards in that pile at the bottom of the deck, that section of the grid is now empty, it is able to have a new card placed on it.
 o You add it to a royal as hit points for the royal it is most like it(follow rules of value, if you have 2 royals of the same suit, give the armor to the one with the least hit points 
 • King can only be attacked by points of its same suits
 • Queens can only be attacked by cards of the same color
 • When you put a card on an edge, it triggers the cards on either side to attack the royal and check if it can kill it or not
 • A joker or wild means a reset for one of your stacks, cards in stack goes on bottom
